alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 10:51PM EST until January 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Monday was 30.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding and should fall below flood stage before sunrise on Tuesday. The river should run high through Tuesday. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM EST on Tuesday.
